articles.title: ‘Surprise’ plans could bring ICE facility to Merrimack, N.H.
articles.description:
One of the 16 processing sites, which can each hold between 500 and 1,500 beds, is planned for Merrimack, New Hampshire.

The post ‘Surprise’ plans could bring ICE facility to Merrimack, N.H. appeared first on Boston.com.
